name: @teclead/search-module
description: An NPM module for the Teclead Search Service which can be used for Adobe AEM or other Content Management Systems.

scripts.build:project: rm -rf dist/ && npm run build && cp package.json ./dist && cp README.md ./dist && mkdir dist/lib && cp lib/synonyms.txt ./dist/lib/synonyms.txt

author: Teclead
